original_text: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Judah, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have despised the law of the Lord, and have not kept his commandments, and their lies caused them to err, after the which their fathers have walked:
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 유다의 서너 가지 죄로 말미암아 내가 그 벌을 돌이키지 아니하리니 이는 그들이 여호와의 율법을 멸시하며 그 율례를 지키지 아니하고 그의 조상들이 따라가던 거짓 것에 미혹되었음이라

sentences.original_text: I will not turn away the punishment thereof
because they have despised the law of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 주의 율법을 멸시했기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: and have not kept his commandments
and their lies caused them to err
after which their fathers have walked
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 조상들이 행하던 것을 따랐기 때문이라
